comments.content: Dav(id), thank you for mentioning Anivers.

You are very welcome, Jos. _(Actually/Originally 'Anivers' would have been the one for the 'Sans Serif' category, but I really liked 'Herzchen' and still wanted to mention 'Anivers'. ;)_

Dav

Another reason for me to be glad that Anivers has a free weight ;-)  
Herzchen is very nice btw.
